page.title: 20LITTLE STRETTON.
page.content: There are two small, pretty pubs in Little Stretton. Both of them are old with very low ceilings. Lots of people go in for drinks and main meals. There is one general store called Keenans Grocers. There is a new estate of bungalows called Crown Close. There are some biggish new houses but most of the rest are old and quite small. There are two biggish farms. There are many old people who move here to retire. {Ashes Hollow}is a peaceful valley with a stream and footpath. There is a camp site by the ford. There is an unusual black and white {thatched church.}The church is not registered for weddings. You need permision from the Archbishop of Canterbury to have a wedding there. There have been only two{weddings in {the last 80 years.}
